scripts.build:prod: pnpm run clean && pnpm run prisma:generate && tsc && pnpm run remove-comments
scripts.clean:all: pnpm run clean && rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.check: pnpm run type-check && pnpm run lint && pnpm run format:check
scripts.prisma:setup: pnpm run prisma:generate && pnpm run prisma:migrate:deploy && pnpm run prisma:seed
scripts.list:features: ls -la src/features/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'No features directory found'
scripts.dev:prisma:generate: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm prisma:generate
scripts.dev:prisma:format: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm prisma:format
scripts.dev:prisma:validate: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm prisma:validate
scripts.dev:prisma:migrate: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm prisma:migrate
scripts.dev:prisma:migrate:deploy: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm prisma:migrate:deploy
scripts.dev:prisma:migrate:reset: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm prisma:migrate:reset
scripts.dev:prisma:migrate:status: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm prisma:migrate:status
scripts.dev:prisma:studio: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm prisma:studio
scripts.dev:prisma:seed: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm prisma:seed
scripts.dev:prisma:db:push: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm prisma:db:push
scripts.dev:prisma:db:pull: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm prisma:db:pull
scripts.dev:prisma:db:seed: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm prisma:db:seed
scripts.dev:prisma:setup: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm prisma:setup
scripts.dev:install: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm install
scripts.dev:build: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm build
scripts.dev:lint: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm lint
scripts.dev:lint:fix: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm lint:fix
scripts.dev:format: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm format
scripts.dev:type-check: docker-compose --profile dev exec app-dev pnpm type-check
scripts.prod:prisma:generate: docker-compose --profile prod exec app pnpm prisma:generate
scripts.prod:prisma:format: docker-compose --profile prod exec app pnpm prisma:format
scripts.prod:prisma:validate: docker-compose --profile prod exec app pnpm prisma:validate
scripts.prod:prisma:migrate: docker-compose --profile prod exec app pnpm prisma:migrate
scripts.prod:prisma:migrate:deploy: docker-compose --profile prod exec app pnpm prisma:migrate:deploy
scripts.prod:prisma:migrate:reset: docker-compose --profile prod exec app pnpm prisma:migrate:reset
scripts.prod:prisma:migrate:status: docker-compose --profile prod exec app pnpm prisma:migrate:status
scripts.prod:prisma:studio: docker-compose --profile prod exec app pnpm prisma:studio
scripts.prod:prisma:seed: docker-compose --profile prod exec app pnpm prisma:seed
scripts.prod:prisma:db:push: docker-compose --profile prod exec app pnpm prisma:db:push
scripts.prod:prisma:db:pull: docker-compose --profile prod exec app pnpm prisma:db:pull
scripts.prod:prisma:db:seed: docker-compose --profile prod exec app pnpm prisma:db:seed
scripts.prod:prisma:setup: docker-compose --profile prod exec app pnpm prisma:setup
